roleset.name: give out, radiate

role.descr: cause or source of what is given off

example.name: Non-agentive source
example.text: The small colorful circle between her eyes was effusing radiance .

propbank.arg: The small colorful circle between her eyes

example.name: Agentive effusion
example.text: He was effusing the water on my hot shoulders and my steaming back .

propbank.arg: on my hot shoulders and my steaming back

example.name: Metaphorical effusion
example.text: Jack was effusing his charm quite vigorously at that time .

example.name: Both args
example.text: The cuttlefish obscures the sight of his pursuers by his effusion of ink .

roleset.note: EFFUSE-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel entries to VN, PB and sense groupings. No appropriate VN entry found. Framed by Claire. (from effuse.01-v)
EFFUSION-N NOTES: Corresponds with effuse.01 (from effusion.01-n)

roleset.name: speak enthusiastically

example.name: With PP 'over'
example.text: Meanwhile , my companion was effusing over his Bistro - special Fried Sole .

propbank.arg: over his Bistro - special Fried Sole

example.name: Direct speech
example.text: " I wish I was that together , " she effused .

propbank.arg: I wish I was that together

example.name: With PP 'about'
example.text: She effused about how she had been skating from the heart .

propbank.arg: about how she had been skating from the heart

example.name: Arg0 and Arg1
example.text: His effusion of joyful greetings made us wince .

roleset.note: EFFUSE-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel entries to VN, PB and sense groupings. No appropriate VN entry found. Comparison with frame for 'remark.' Framed by Claire. (from effuse.02-v)
EFFUSION-N NOTES: Corresponds with effuse.02. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from effusion.02-n)
